alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 10:17AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, greatest on the Tug Hill Plateau. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce some blowing and drifting snow in open areas. * WHERE...Lewis county. Greatest accumulations across the Tug Hill Plateau. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. Heaviest snow will be this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with deep snow cover on roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute today.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
